tweets.text:
Never drive through flood water ‚Äì it‚Äôs not worth the risk. 

Not only can flood water damage your car but it can be life threatening. 

Always check your route before you travel #RoadSafetyWeek

https://t.co/vhT6xEG4z2 #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/Y9WDFFlmpP

tweets.text:
SEA DEFENCE WORK WILL HAVE MAJOR ENVIRONMENTAL BOOST TOO thanks to @ArtecologyDept @arcteam @WBM_Blackwater @EnvAgency! #Environment Minister @pow_rebecca highlighted the work in this field by Sandown-based @ArtecologyDept. #Design #Nature #biodiversity
https://t.co/21dgEE7jcn

Something else @Will_Tanner @ukonward @ab4scambs According to the @EnvAgency 50% of the future national water need is in the South East (Summary, National Framework), Cambridge is the driest city in the UK. Yet it is in the region the govt has targeted for the highest growth.

We are working with @WYFRS & @YorkshireWater at the Bradford fire site by removing contaminated fire-fighting water which has collected there in pools.
 
Pumps will be used to direct the water into the sewer and away from nearby becks. https://t.co/zNI1QlLU1x

@EnvAgencyYNE @WYFRS @PHE_YorksHumber @bradfordmdc @YorkshireWater @EnvAgency @AdamBaylissEA @Bradford_TandA @OliverHarmarEA @BradfordChamber @kersten_england Well done. Remind us why you didn't enforce the environmental breaches on the site in the first place, despite knowing about them for months. This incident may not have happened if prompt enforcement had been taken.
@bradfordmdc @EnvAgencyYNE If @bradfordmdc had acted sooner to prevent the illegal dumping of tyres instead of waiting for 50,000 to go up in flames there would be no need for any road closures.

Other interesting figures from this @ukonward report ‚Äúthe Housing Infrastructure Fund has spent ¬£115 per head in the East of England, ¬£97 in London, ¬£95 in the South East, and ¬£79 in the South West, compared to ¬£10 in the West Midlands and just ¬£4 in Yorkshire‚Äù.

tweets.text:
Day 100. That's it.
It's on you.
You have the power to inform about
 #PFOS and #PFAS chemicals in UK waters.
Please use it.
I've tried. 

 @EnvAgency @DefraWater @GeorgeMonbiot @carolecadwalla @BBCNews @Channel4News @jonsnowC4 @EnvAgencyYNE @WCL_News @annalom87 @GeorgeGreenwood

üêâCan you give our friends @EnvAgency Ecology Lab that #FridayFeeling by donating some larval cases (exuviae) please?They are after some species in particular so check out our news post for full details: https://t.co/9TT59TFkXqüêâ @SIBirdClub @Lucy_Lapwing @_joelashton @DilgerTV https://t.co/GpxziL5zQ8

tweets.text:
A big step towards @BritishArmy achieving a neutral carbon footprint whilst delivering Operational capability. Success as 3 new Carbon Zero buildings open at Nesscliff Training Camp - better facilities and driving hard towards our goal to be carbon free by 2050.
@EnvAgencySE https://t.co/MjINYEJ1Gf
Many thanks to the @EnvAgencyMids for letting us trial out their robo-mowers; easing your access when visiting Saltfleetby-Theddlethorpe NNR #HandsFaceSpace https://t.co/frH9H24Bos

Phase 1 of the Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme includes 6km of earth embankments and flood walls which include integrated glass panels at key viewpoints.

For more information and facts on the scheme visit @theFloodHub https://t.co/XTYr7iH1wB https://t.co/ujmYPEbrgC

STOP-PRESS: #Ineson2020 Lecture 26 November 4pm-5:30pm

Get your free tickets here: https://t.co/UDApXQkcjY      

Listen to Anne Dacey Head of integrated water planning @EnvAgency talk about her 25 years experience within the water & environmental sector. https://t.co/7uE20kE61f https://t.co/YmjZBo1cFg

Work on a ¬£475,000 package of measures to help reduce flooding in two Farnborough roads is set to start next Spring, after the scheme was approved this week https://t.co/eDuLHpgR5d https://t.co/YjVFjTYsyL

Our officers are on site at the major fire in Bradford today using pumps to get rid of water contaminated by the tyres.

We're supporting @WYFRS, @PHE_YorksHumber; @bradfordmdc & @YorkshireWater 
More than 40 members of our staff are working 24/7 to help

https://t.co/pPw7LMTzbX https://t.co/AUtpJZmHmi

üö® We need YOUR help in deciding the winner & two runners up from our annual employee Nature Focus photograph competition! üö® 

This year‚Äôs theme is pollinators! 

It‚Äôs been a tough job shortlisting the snaps to six & we want you to decide your top three (..Answers in comments)üíô https://t.co/FOINqBMbX4

tweets.text: Remember! The #badgercull is taking place in England - a country that ranks among the worst countries in the world for lack of biodiversity & extinction of species. Red squirrels, dormice & many other species have all had bounties on their heads. Now it's the turn of the badger. https://t.co/DKG1m3zFWb

#TeamEA Field Teams in Cumbria have been training for incident response today. 

Our teams are always  ready to respond to incidents 24/7 and 365 days of the year. 

Need to report an environmental incident? Call our incident hotline on 0800 80 70 60 https://t.co/xQEc92ev2k

On #TransDayOfRemembrance we remember those who have lost their lives to transphobic violence.

We are committed to supporting our trans colleagues. Inclusion is everyone's business.

#Stonewall100 #TeamEA https://t.co/3UYaMiPXfW

@_PoliticalNinja Because @EnvAgencyYNE could not be bothered to enforce. They also seem to be dropping their objections to the Aire Valley Incinerator, further destroying air quality. At least they will end up in court over that matter, where their failure to enforce can be discussed openly.

tweets.text: 2/2 @EnvAgencyMids are repairing lagoon wall & closing on agreed design of left bank defence repair. @NottsCC have written to households where underground repairs need to take place. @FlagLowdham has distributed a Covid-19 and flood defence booklet to every household @E_Mayle1

@EnvAgencyYNE @WYFRS @PHE_YorksHumber @bradfordmdc @WYRForum @EnvAgency @networkrail @LeedsCC_Help @OliverHarmarEA My bedroom window is really drafty and I had really low quality sleep last night trying to keep my nose and mouth covered and woke up with a terrible headache. The smell has cleared throughout the day. Hoping to sleep better tonight!! Thanks for all you are doing

Real-life stories and 360 video is a powerful combo. Help Callum uses this to put you in the shoes of a young person affected by flooding. (w/ @CUIDARProject @EnvAgency)

https://t.co/XHuucucn6u

#FloodAware https://t.co/pUl0o4G9Il

Thanks @catchmentdesign for installing and @EnvAgencyNW for funding. https://t.co/meQP5zJ9wd

The following roads remain closed due to the tyre fire

‚û°Ô∏èParma St junction with Upper Castle St
‚û°Ô∏èMill Lane junction with Nelson St 
‚û°Ô∏èMill Lane junction with Fitzwilliam St
All other roads are now open. 

HGVs can now access Pitcliffe Way Industrial Estate.
